Producer: Will Ferrell, Adam McKay, Chris Henchy, Peter Principato, Paul Young
Rating: R (Nudity|Drug and Alcohol Use|Pervasive Language|Strong Crude & Sexual Content)
Synopsis: Obsessed with the YouTube Web site, four New Orleans teens make a pact to lose their virginity, document the experience, and take a celebratory hit on their female-shaped bong. After his three buddies accomplish their goal in rapid succession, Matt (Matt Bennett) hopes to do the deed with his girlfriend. When his efforts fall through, Matt embarks on a furious quest to cash in his V-card, shadowed at every turn by his camera-wielding adoptive brother, Zack (Zack Pearlman).
Title: The Virginity Hit
